english_example_sentence: If you add a little salt to the soup, it will be more delicious.
russian_example_sentence: Если вы добавите немного соли в суп, он будет вкуснее.
turkish_example_sentence: Çorbaya biraz tuz ekleseniz, daha lezzetli olur.
